{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:48:02.000
    | text      = So real quick, when he said that these are some of the rumors and speculations, I found it incredibly confusing at first because he's just done this part where he's like the base, the Air Force base has heightened security.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:48:16.000
    | text      = He was like, is he talking about those rumors? Yeah, are those the rumors or what? You're about to say the rumors.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:48:22.000
    | text      = Right.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:48:22.000
    | text      = And I had to go back and listen to it a couple times and I'm very certain that he's saying that the things that were reported before, the Air Force base, the FBI substation, all that stuff, that is not rumor.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:48:34.000
    | text      = Those are true.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:48:34.000
    | text      = What he's about to talk about is rumors.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:48:36.000
    | text      = It was Jessica Rabbit.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:48:38.000
    | text      = Remember, these are rumors, speculations.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:48:46.000
    | text      = A local television station in Oklahoma City received a call from an unidentified male, reportedly speaking with a foreign accent, who stated that the Nation of Islam claimed responsibility for the bombing.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:49:00.000
    | text      = I wonder how much utility there is in coming on a conspiracy paranoia-themed broadcast and just repeating random rumors about the bombing.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:49:08.000
    | text      = Hey, these are rumors.

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

    | text      = this tape.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:43:49.560

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

{{TranscriptBlock

}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:44:13.500

}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:44:19.840

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

}}

{{TranscriptBlock

{{TranscriptBlock

    | name      = Unknown Speaker

{{TranscriptBlock

{{TranscriptBlock

{{TranscriptBlock

}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

    | text      = be a bomb made of fertilizer and fuel oil, which literally means nothing.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:46:37.319
    | text      = This is the exact same thing as Alex Jones looking at pictures from the Boston bombing
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:46:48.840

}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

{{TranscriptBlock

{{TranscriptBlock

}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

{{TranscriptBlock

{{TranscriptBlock

{{TranscriptBlock
